article_title: To Achieve ObamaCare's Insurance Goals, We Must Abolish ObamaCare

article_metadata.description: ObamaCare was sold to the American people as an “effort to help 40 to 50 million Americans with low income or people with preexisting conditions.” (Democratic Rep. Earl Blumenauer,  http://thomas.loc.gov).  ObamaCare’s original promises (now long forgotten) were that we can help those 40 to 50 million unfortunates who can’t get insurance, keep [...]
article_metadata.author: Paul Roderick Gregory
